content: I think our core bank -- our core bank in the market we service -- then we could probably grow 10%, 12% but when you add Panacea and Life Premium Finance, we have $1 billion visions on both of those lines of business. This is a line of business that I can -- I'm not going to guarantee anything, but I -- the level of confidence I have that this division can get to $1 billion, touching out a 1.5 or better ROA on riskless assets I mean, why in the world would this company be able to recruit something like that, to build something like that, that's the kind of organization we're building. Right now, they're going to -- I think they could probably get to, I think we're looking at the pipelines, if things close, if we have the success we want, I think that could maybe get to $70 million or $80 million in the second quarter.
